## Overview

<p class="relax">
I mainly work in phonetics, laboratory phonology, and second language acquisition. My main research questions focus on how L2 learners acquire their L2 prosodic system.
I am a member of the Rutgers Applied Phonetics Group, organized by Dr. Joseph Casillas: <https://RAP-group.github.io>.
I am also a proponent of Open Science. More information can be found here: <https://fosil-project.github.io/>.
</p>
